title: YAY URF...oh wait everyone is a tryhard now....
body:
What the hell happened? I get flamed every game for not picking a certain champ, everyone is just spamming the most absurd of the absurd champions and refuses to try new things. Everyone gets upset when we dont ff because its urf. 

What happened? Where did the magic go?

replies.body: The magic went down the drain. This is exactly why game modes are temporary.
^ This. There is always a meta formed eventually. The difference is that this meta was already partially established so things become repetitive more quickly.

Rose-tinted goggles too strong. They remember some of the fun they had and absolutely none of the shameless power bandwagoning that was going on, even then. 

"Lol let's all play Hecarim, Zed and Sona!" even then.

it's why I play bot matches for urf. It's as simple as "hey, I wonder how this champ is in urf mode"
everyone else: "only one way to find out :D"
URF has ALWAYS been like this. I have no idea why people plead and beg for this game mode to return.
well i know why, cause they think if they lower the skill level they will be better at the game. Lets be honest URF gets about as low at skill as you can get in this game.
its a fun game mode for people who just want to let thier hair back and go crazy sometimes.
THEN WHY ARE PEOPLE SO MAD WHEN I JUST TRY TO HAVE SOME FUN!?!

The magic left after a few games for me. People played it like ranked, and they still are. Ban OP things, OP things still get through, people spam OP things. 

I really don't get the hype for it. Like I know everyone is just gonna downvote the shit out of me but I only liked this mode for about 3 games (Both times it showed up). After that it was just people spamming the most obnoxious champions in the mode. And if you say anything about it? "Lol this mode is for FUN. WHY are you complaining?" 
-TheGuyPlayingKatarinaAndHisGaySidekickZed

Wanna know what mode I had fun in? All for one. Me and 4 other friends played Gangplank and won literally every single game when we played him (And that was like literally 10+ games). Even if we lost on other champs, it was still fun. There were not too many champs that just absolutely ruined the game for everyone, at least,, not NEARLY as many as URF has.

That's just my opinion on it though I guess. I really don't get why everyone loves this mode. Maybe the ones that wanted it back for so long are the people that are spamming Ezreal/Fizz/Kat/Zed/Nidalee etc, so of course THEY have fun.

It's really unfortunate, because URF has the potential to be one of the most entertaining game modes. But it's ruined by people who will only play the most OP strategies just to win - even in a silly game mode like this.
WHICH IS WHY WE BURN THE OP STRATEGIES, BURRRRRN THEEEEM!
Wish it was random. I'd actually have some fun then.
Not a bad idea for a future iteration of the game mode. I wouldn't mind All Random URF, even on Summoner's Rift it could be fun.

Pretty much, all my games have the usual: {{champion:53}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:238}} unless they are banned.

My friend keeps spamming Zed on URF and usually goes positive unless he falls terribly behind. Well, I won't mind it, problem is I don't want to go against a Zed that is even more mobile than before, and want to ban him (most of my champions are immobile). So when we do get to not go against Zed, he changes to either LeBlanc, Fizz or Ezreal. Pretty boring to say the least.

I was hoping to see Shen/Rammus top lanes, Lux/Morgana bot lane and more things you don't get to play on normal games but... :/
I tried machine gun nasus with them q's, but zed/ezreal top completly harassed me out.
I tried Singed. It was pointless. All those mobile champions kited me, whether they were melee or ranged. Unless I flashed, I wouldn't be able to do anything.
As a singed player I didnt even bother. He has no place in urf.
But... INFINITE POISON CLOUD D':
I have that in normal mode.
Try {{champion:30}}. His Q has a .2 sec CD for infinite spamming, his W has a 3 sec CD, his E can be left on infinitely and his ult only has a 40 second CD. He can solo dragon at level 7...

speaking of leaving stuff on infinitely...

{{champion:50}} anybody?

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BrqLUyHQ,comment-id=000200010001,timestamp=2015-04-01T23:05:49.848+0000)
>
> speaking of leaving stuff on infinitely...
> 
> {{champion:50}} anybody?

sweet jesus, idk why i haven't seen more swain he's broken as all hell

That might be because I played against the ultimate hell team earlier: Trynd Leona top, Swain mid, Ryze Raka bot. *shudder*
Why does no one jungle in urf?
IDK, because the speed you can clear gets you ahead really well, especially if you gank a lot.
how the fuck did i make this thread last night and get like 15 downvotes instantly?

> [{quoted}](name=Treasure Goblin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BrqLUyHQ,comment-id=0020,timestamp=2015-04-01T22:48:45.017+0000)
>
> how the fuck did i make this thread last night and get like 15 downvotes instantly?

Too early, people were still happy with their rose tinted Urf.
it was the same thing last year. just wait a couple days when everyone stops playing it.

What magic? Riot had to constantly remove champs from the pool last year.

Everyone keeps acting like URF was this great magical thing. Same thing that happens to every temp mode is happening AGAIN to URF. 

When will you people learn you do not play games to lose? It defeats the point of playing the game, so people play to win.

One of the advantages of custom modes is that Riot doesn't **have** to balance them nearly as well as the permanent ones.  There aren't any real rewards, they're designed to be a change of pace from the regular game.  If they amuse you, great.  If you're looking for a finely tuned competitive experience, they're probably not for you.

URF in particular is just blatantly, hilariously unbalanced.  It's a joke.   It's not supposed to be a serious mode for competitive play.  If you were to try to play it "seriously" there would probably be about 20 usable champions.  Maybe.

Itll be fun they said.

Is always the most chilling experience out there they said.

These are the reasons it should be permanent mode they said.

This is why it'll never be a permanent game mode, even now that it's temporary they take it like srs bsns. People will always tryhard, all of my keks.

I didnt get to play urf last year and after all the bitching and moaning on the boards i thought it was gonna be some god like game mode.
It wasnt bad, but id defintly wasnt what people on the boards made it out to be -_-
I honestly dont even like the game mode
It was alot more magicial the first time around, nobody knew who was strong and everyone was doing these crazy gimmicky teams and it was awesome. Now since a meta has been found its become stagnant

This game mode is suppose to be a fun mode, where no meta exists, and anything is game. Its basically "Here are a bunch of buffs, here is your beloved map, now go fuck shit up". That is how it was intended, and that is how I will play it.
But of course you get your flaming try-hards who think the game mode matters (when really, it doesn't, your wins aren't even recorded on your profile). Hell, you don't even need to win a match to get the player icon, you just have to complete your first match of URF. Sure, you get IP, but if you want to farm IP go play ARAM or Co-op. If this game mode was meant to be taken seriously, it wouldn't be an April Fools game mode.

I'm pretty sure Dominion still offers the fastest IP/minute.
... in game.

lmao, what's Dominion? ;)

No but seriously, does it?

The IP/minute gain is the same on all 3 modes. But there's also base gain for winning or loosing; ARAM's is reduced.

Since Dominion generally finishes faster, your overall IP/minute is actually higher.
That said... Thanks to Riot Abandoning it, the Queue times are a tad ridiculous.
Maybe if they buffed defense instead of only offense then it wouldn't be all assasins

They needed to double turret range. That would fix everything.
And by everything I mean nothing. 
But that is the spirit of URF.
I like how you think.

It´s what did happen the last time URF was around, and the particular reason why this is only a temporary gamemode...it´s just not fun in the long run (and not even on the short anymore as most people already found out what´s strong the last time around).

about 6 games..
None in my team has used ward even once (only Kat who used it to jump)..


My head hurts from facepalming

Seriously. I told the guy I was in lane with, if he didn't start using his trinket I was going to go lane with someone who would. 
EVERYONE brings teleport, why don't you have wards down 24/7?
Mute button is your friend.
Its not just toxic people though, its also everyone is only meta picking and wont try anything new or fun.
Try killing a zed/leblanc at all though, its god damn impossible and everyone plays them :C

Try {{champion:131}} , she's a monster when she hits 6 (5/4/3 sec ult, you don't even need to land Q). Just don't go full AP, go for Zhonyas, Merc shoes, Abyssal Sceptre, and you still do ridiculous damage while the tenacity lets you keep the shield up.

I 1v1 LeBlanc without taking any damage; for Zed you need Zhonyas, though. I don't know why Riot left her shield unnerfed (only hers and Udyr's), but I love it.
got yelled at by most of my team for going jungle in urf, may not be a popular pick but hopefully its not bannable as i was reported by everyone for going jungle >.>

> [{quoted}](name=Makior72,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BrqLUyHQ,comment-id=0030,timestamp=2015-04-02T02:24:08.058+0000)
>
> got yelled at by most of my team for going jungle in urf, may not be a popular pick but hopefully its not bannable as i was reported by everyone for going jungle >.>

its mostly pointless because everybody can dragon and baron with ease, most of them by themselves, and top is going to almost always be a duo lane. Everyone takes teleport anyway so the mobile ganker role is already taken by literally everyone.

Sure they buffed Smite but I honestly think they should have just removed it.
